==Lyrics==
{| class="wikitable"
!Lyrics
!Translation
|-
|Domina praeteritae peribitur et sculpitur crastino
|The mistress of the past will perish, and the future will be written
|-
|Canonem gnosis inscribit inclinabimini non iam ad caelesti
|As it is imposed by the Gnosis' law, you must seek no longer what is heavenly
|-
|Ecce premeris quoniam iuvenis sanguinum es derelicte
|Behold, much will be asked of you for you are young and abandoned by your own blood
|-
|A malo pressa voces iterum conquiratis quam manui sis tenere etiamsi<br>(Nolite me relinquere ir in finem etiamsi)
|But even beneath the pressure of evil voices, seek those who stayed by your side till the very end<br>(Do not abandon me, not even at the end)
|-
|Qui formaret falsum deum<br>(Vae cui formavit deum)
|Who would create a false god?<br>(Woe to those who dare create a god)
|-
|Ad nihil utile
|But it's all to no avail
|-
|Poesis eis letis recto fatus tecum fallis deperdite
|This story is a rhapsody to them, but to you it is a deceit you are lost in
|-
|Estris vae falsatis quod ad propinquavit
|Woe to the false prophets who got near you
|}
